name: Molestar
desc: A whimpy cat who can't defend zemself for the life of zem.

name: Liondawn
desc: A charismatic deputy who always made his leader the butt of her jokes.

name: Ashpoppy
desc: The local MoleClan healer, she concerns herself not with the 'normy' members of the clan.

name: Molestream
desc: A raging tom-cat who stops at nothing when ripping his opponents to shreds.

name: Thrushbranch
desc: Molestream's littermate, the two can often be seen spending time with each other. Not much else to note.

name: Shimmerwater
desc: Considered one of the more relaxed members of the clan, Shimmerwater tends to stay out of trouble and keeps out of trouble.

name: Hickorybird
desc: A senior warrior that has seen enough for his age. He tends to go on patrols just to watch birds.

name: Mistjaw
desc: One of Needlestar's biggest haters, purr always finds a way to make fun of purr leader, no matter the situation.

name: Blizzardbright
desc: A well-seasoned warrior that knows a few tricks or two. Usually doesn't act out of line.

name: Blossompad
desc: A young warrior that enjoys spending time taking care of the clan's youth. They seem to be good at it, so nobody really complains.

name: Dewhawk
desc: A tom-cat that doesn't know when to quit it! He's always up in everyone's business, it can sometimes get irritating.

name: Mintrun
desc: A she-cat that doesn't seem to talk much. Prefers to keep her peace, but wouldn't let go of a chance to have a little but of fun!

name: Autumnnose
desc: With a keen sense of smell, Autumnnose is the perfect candidate for a hunting patrol!

name: Pearlnight
desc: Pearlnight's parents sure knew what name they had in mind. Named for the white spot on her head, Pearlnight's coat sure does make it look like a pearl in the night!

name: Daisyclaw
desc: A formidable warrior, Daisyclaw always brings victory to the battles he leads!

name: Mosspaw
desc: A young apprentice that's doing everything in their power to become a great warrior. Curious and persistent, he's sure to win some hearts!

name: Brightbounce
desc: A permanent den-mother of the clan, she's rather easy-going and often lets the kits get too rough. Her clanmates have tried to urge her back to warrior duties, but she simply won't budge.

name: Moonwater
desc: Often called 'Moonwatcher', Moonwater enjoys basking in the moonlight. She takes on a motherly role with Pearlnight after her parents perished in battle.

name: Brightmask
desc: A young mother that had just come to MoleClan as refuge. She gets along well with the other den-parents and kits.

name: Badgerkit
desc: Littermate of Leopardkit, Badgerkit likes to roughhouse and cause trouble around the nursery.

name: Leopardkit
desc: Littermate of Badgerkit, Leopardkit prefers to play softer games that don't require much effort.

name: Sandykit
desc: Just a little baby, doesn't really do much.

name: Fernkit
desc: A she-kit that had a mysterious eye injury from before joining the clan. Good playmates with Sandykit, seems to be familiar with Badgerkit.

name: Spottedfire
desc: An elder that acts like she has nothing else to lose.
